title: Talk while walking or standing animations
description: Collection of talking animations while walking or standing
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW - https://youtu.be/6TWnqCt4uVg


A set of 64 third-person talks while walking or standing animations

pose matched start and end frames

no need to re-target animations if using the default Unreal Mannequin


We invite you to visit my page. There are other works we would like you to see here.
technicalDetails:
Animations :

Movements “in place”:

  • TALKING WHILE STANDING V1
  • TALKING WHILE STANDING V2
  • TALKING WHILE STANDING V3
  • TALKING WHILE STANDING V4
  • TALKING WHILE STANDING V5
  • TALKING WHILE STANDING V6
  • TALKING WHILE STANDING WITH HANDS BEHIND HIM END
  • TALKING WHILE STANDING WITH HANDS BEHIND HIM LOOP V1
  • TALKING WHILE STANDING WITH HANDS BEHIND HIM LOOP V2
  • TALKING WHILE STANDING WITH HANDS BEHIND HIM START

Movements “in place” and “root motion”:

  • NORMAL WALKING 120cm
  • SALUTE WHILE WALKING ON THE LEFT SIDE 360cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE
  • START WALKING 30cm
  • START WALKING FROM THE LEFT SIDE 150cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE 210cm
  • STOP WALKING 30cm
  • STOP WALKING ON THE LEFT SIDE 120cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE
  • TALK WHILE WALKING V1 ON THE LEFT SIDE 480cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE
  • TALK WHILE WALKING V2 ON THE LEFT SIDE 480cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE
  • TALK WHILE WALKING V3 ON THE LEFT SIDE 120cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE
  • TALK WHILE WALKING V4 ON THE LEFT SIDE 600cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE
  • TALK WHILE WALKING V5 ON THE LEFT SIDE 600cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE
  • TALK WHILE WALKING V6 ON THE LEFT SIDE 720cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE
  • TALK WHILE WALKING V7 ON THE LEFT SIDE 120cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE
  • TALK WHILE WALKING V8 ON THE LEFT SIDE 360cm AND THE RIGHT SIDE
  • TALK_WHILE_WALKING_BEHIND_HIM_LEFT_SIDE_360cm AND RIGHT SIDE

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

Number of Animations: 64

Animation types: In-place and Root-motion

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes, Mac: Yes, PlayStation: Yes, Xbox: Yes, Android: Yes, iOS: Yes, Linux: Yes, HTML5: Yes, Steam VR: Yes, Oculus: Yes, Gear VR: Yes
